page.title: 15Sundays in Ladock
page.content: Ladock Juniors and their families get up at various times between 5.30 and 11.00a.m.The earliest riser helps her herdsman father with the milking. Breakfast consists of cereals and in 1 case of croissants, no-one mentions having bacon and egg,which was the usual breakfast fare. 5 children attend chapel, 6 go to Church and one boy to the Roman Catholic Church in Truro.Lunch is mainly a roast meal.1 girl has sandwiches and 1 boy has a cafe lunch. The most dominant activities on Sundays are watching T.V.,feeding and exercising horses and dogs.A fair amount of shopping is done,some people going as far as Par market. The most popular T.V. programmes are Esther Rantzen's "Thats Life","Winner Takes All",films and "Spitting Image".Bedtime is anytime from 8.00 until 11.00p.m.
